_header: Illi qui sunt in fide stiff and stable
Subjects: steadfastness, characteristics of; virtues; sermons, verse in
_description: The steadfast man — two macaronic couplets in a Latin sermon, ‘Filius’

CamCCC423.Transcription:
Illi qui sunt in fide styf and stabullIlli qui sunt to
                    þer enmyes peseabillqui diligunt inimicos that dos þem
                        wrongqui contra temptaciones sunt myghty and strong
